at.ac.acdh.transformer

Class ProfileTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.acdh.transformer.ProfileTransformer

  • public class ProfileTransformer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for converting CLARIN profiles into X3ML files. It returns X3ML object for the given profile to the caller.
    Author:
    dostojic

        public X3ML transform(java.lang.String mappingXml,
                      java.lang.String profileUrl,
                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> conditions)
               throws com.ximpleware.VTDException
        Parameters:
        mappingXml - - path to the xml file containing mappings
        profileUrl - - profile's XSD
        conditions - - list of strings used for filtering conditional entities in xml mapping file
        Returns:
        X3ML object that can be serialized to X3ML xml file
        Throws:
        com.ximpleware.VTDException

      • transform

        private X3ML transform(CMDI2CIDOCMap xmlMappings,
                       java.lang.String profileUrl,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> conditions)
                throws com.ximpleware.VTDException
        This method parses profile, and based on mappings creates X3ML object.
        Parameters:
        xmlMappings - - CMDI2CIDOCMap object
        profileUrl - - url of the profile's XSD
        conditions - - list of strings used for filtering conditional entities in xml mapping file
        Returns:
        X3ML object that can be serialized to X3ML xml file
        Throws:
        com.ximpleware.VTDException
        See Also:
        ParsedProfile X3ML
